desc:
There is currently an issue with the case filing date whereby the system is picking current date as future date and not allowing for the matter to be saved. 

The judgment was granted on 15/09/2014 which was the first date we used and couldnâ€™t save, I then tested with the 2013 date to see if it would give a different message and that is the message on the screenshot. The judgment was only saved when the capturer entered the 01/09/2014.
name: CW - GCCW074 - Case filing date issue
